```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
x <- read_csv(file = "data/social_capital_county.csv")
x |> separate_wider_delim(
    cols = county_name, 
    delim = ", ", 
    names = c("county_name", "state_name")
  ) |>
  group_by(state_name) |>
  select(county_name, ec_county, pop2018)
```
